patterns: Can you give me safety tips?
responses: Wash your hands for at least 20 seconds
Please consult the doctor if feverish!
Limit social gatherings and time spent in crowded places.

patterns: Do I have the corona virus
responses: Some common symptoms are fever, dry cough and tiredness.

patterns: What to do if I have covid?
What is the treatment for this?
responses: If you feel sick you should rest, drink plenty of fluid, and eat nutritious food.
Stay in a separate room from other family members.
If you are feeling extremely sick then visit the narest hospital.
Remdesivir (Veklury) is currently the only medication approved by the FDA to treat coronavirus disease.
Nearby hospital phone numbers: 098140 62682/0182 426 0066
Call this number if you need help: +91-11-23978046
